Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board's decision that the Applicant made a material misrepresentation was reasonable under section 40 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Applicant transferred belongings to boyfriend's car to appear as though bringing fewer items
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Material misrepresentation inducing or could induce error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Transfer of belongings to mislead border officials
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative proceeding followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Factor: Attempt to avoid scrutiny by reducing visible personal effects
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of Boardâ€™s finding of material misrepresentation
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Attempted to re-enter Canada after prior denial by concealing extent of belongings
Crimes.Omission_Type: Withholding material facts about goods being brought into Canada

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board's decision that the Applicant made a material misrepresentation was reasonable
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Applicant transferred belongings to another vehicle to mislead about quantity of goods
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Material misrepresentation relating to admission into Canada
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Act of transferring belongings misled border officials
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative determination with subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Application_Factor: Prior denial due to excessive belongings and lack of funds
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of finding of material misrepresentation
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Attempted entry with reduced personal effects after prior denial
Crimes.Omission_Type: Withholding material facts regarding possession of goods at border
